clinical_study.brief_title: A Livelihood Intervention for Impoverished Women and Children in Rural Uganda
clinical_study.official_title: A Livelihood Intervention for Impoverished Women and Children in Rural Uganda: Randomized Controlled Trial

collaborator.agency: Mbarara University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to determine whether a livelihood intervention can improve health and schooling outcomes of the children of woman participating in a livelihood intervention in rural Uganda.

primary_outcome.description: Height-for-age calculated based on child height and child age, measured for children under 5 years of age
Weight-for-height calculated based on child height and child weight, measured for children under 5 years of age
Raven's Colored Progressive Matrices test score (range, 0-18), measured for children aged 5-8 years

Mullen Early Learning Scales: 144 items total, divided across 4 subtests in visual receptive organization, visual expressive organization, language expressive organization, and language receptive organization

primary_outcome.measure: Home Observation of the Measurement of Environment Scale
primary_outcome.description: Home Observation of the Measurement of Environment, modified for the Ugandan context (58 items distributed across the following domains: Responsivity, Encouragement of maturity, Emotional climate, Learning materials and opportunities, Enrichment, Family companionship, Family integration and Physical environment)

secondary_outcome.description: Average time spent on school and schoolwork in the past 7 days (number of hours)
Average time spent on household chores and playing in the past 7 days (number of hours)
Average time spent on reading to children or helping with homework in past 7 days (number of hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mother's Aspirations for Child Education Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Mother's aspiration for child's educational attainment, ranging from 1 (finish P7 primary school) to 5 (finish graduate school)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mother's Aspirations for Child Career Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Mother's aspirations for child's adult employment by age 25 (with the option to select one of 33 different blue-collar and white-collar occupational categories)

arm_group.description: Participants' mothers will receive a livelihood intervention package consisting of a orientation and training and a loan package of chickens and associated implements to create poultry microenterprises
Participants' mothers will receive no intervention but will be placed on a waitlist to receive the intervention after a 12-month delay.

intervention.description: Participants' mothers will receive a livelihood intervention package consisting of a orientation and training and a loan package of chickens and associated implements to create poultry microenterprises.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All children under 18 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- Adults older than 18 years
